ai-atk-abh03a61:1_0: It also gives rise to the ties of three kinds of feeling associated with skillful qualities. Causing pleasant feeling arises in him in any way, and on account of the cause, it becomes a condition for the pleasant feeling.
ai-atk-abh03a61:1_1: And here the words, skillful feelings, and feelings are only three and feelings, namely. This is the same way:
ai-atk-abh03a61:1_2: and that which goes along with a hundred leagues, has been exceedingly to be understood as it is not possible for a hundred leagues in the morning.
ai-atk-abh03a61:1_3: And that is how a wholesome feelings should be understood as other.
ai-atk-abh03a61:1_5: and he should position with them.
ai-atk-abh03a61:2_0: The commentary on the colour of the kasiṇa
